# Digital Twins Educational Website - GitHub Pages Project

## Project Overview
This is a GitHub Pages project for a Digital Twins educational website with interactive demos. Originally created by Eduard Torres, customized for Marian Diaz.

## Project Structure
- Main website with educational content about Digital Twins
- Interactive demos for learning concepts
- Responsive design for educational use
- GitHub Pages compatible static files
